description:
In order to evade the clutches of Oh Fuuki and Unification League, Suusu and Haku Gessho have teamed up with Han Unhi, prince of the fox sand clan the Nishisaiiki. Unhi has been pursuing his lover, Reki Setsuyo, through her various reincarnations and seeks to revive their love but Setsuyo`s current incarnation is reluctant to cooperate. Thanks to Gessho`s intervention she has begun to remember her past life and her interactions with Unhi but it might not be enough. Meanwhile, Fuuki plots to find and capture Gessho by any means necessary.
Source: crunchyroll
